name: Relixir
long_description:
Relixir drops magic AI elixir to help brands rank higher and sell more on ChatGPT, Perplexity, etc. 

SEO is dead and 50% of decision makers now use AI search instead to find solutions so it's crucial to now optimize for these generative engines â€” enter Generative Engine Optimization (GEO).

Relixir helps teams automate end-to-end GEO by granting instant AI search engine visibility on their product, identifying search result blindspots for competitor/gaps, and then generating high quality content from original customer/team insights.

We're moving fast, signed 15+ pilots and 5+ paid customers seeing results in production. Join us and start using Relixir! 

The founders Sean and Dennis built an early version of a GEO system that amassed 300k+ views, 5k+ clicks/mo, and 10 inbound calls/wk at their prev. company.
one_liner: The AI Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) Platform
